headline: Fortinet, Inc. Just Beat EPS By 58%: Here's What Analysts Think Will Happen Next
summary: It's been a pretty great week for Fortinet, Inc. ( NASDAQ:FTNT ) shareholders, with its shares surging 17% to US$92.04...

headline: Fortinet price target raised to $83 from $70 at UBS
summary: UBS raised the firm’s price target on Fortinet (FTNT) to $83 from $70 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. The company’s overall 3Q results “were fine” but the overall reacceleration in billings and Q4 guide “is somewhat underwhelming,” the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm thinks the shares are appropriately valued. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news.
